review: My Vizio HDTV is internet ready and I have been using it to watch Amazon Prime movies and Netflix among other apps. I was fed up with the buffering, re-buffering, lost of internet connectivity, out of sync programs, hiccups, and other annoyances, so I tried Fire TV.The specs were impressive, so I decided to give it a try. Performance was even better than I expected. Setup was very easy and only required entering a passkey for my router. I watched a movie. It started almost immediately and played smoothly. Voice control is a killer feature. it is definitely worth the price. I suspect newer smart HDTV's will start using this technology, but until then, the Amazon Fire TV is the way to go.
